ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = A -> ( 0 [,] x ) = ( 0 [,] A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ineq1d | |- ( x = A -> ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) = ( ( 0 [,] A ) i^i Prime ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_sumeq1d | |- ( x = A -> sum_ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ( log ` p ) = sum_ p e. ( ( 0 [,] A ) i^i Prime ) ( log ` p ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-cht | |- theta = ( x e. RR |-> sum_ p e. ( ( 0 [,] x ) i^i Prime ) ( log ` p ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_sumex | |- sum_ p e. ( ( 0 [,] A ) i^i Prime ) ( log ` p ) e. _V |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. RR -> ( theta ` A ) = sum_ p e. ( ( 0 [,] A ) i^i Prime ) ( log ` p ) ) |
